QuestData.Title: Onward to Thelsamar
QuestData.Description: You've helped us quite a bit here. If you're leaving, I'd ask you to take this status report up to Thelsamar.$B$BFollow the road just north, and you can't miss it. Mountaineer Kadrell will want the report.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver Captain Rugelfuss's Status Report to Mountaineer Kadrell in Thelsamar.
QuestData.CompletionText: What can I do for you?
QuestData.RewardText: Glad to hear you've been clearing out the troggs. Let's have a look at this report, and...$B$B...Is that a beer stain?
